AGe.caption: Table name
AGe.doc: Unique table name so you can add columns to it and end it.
AGe.name: table_name

AGh.caption: Repeating structure name
AGh.doc: The repeating structure this table is being repeated into.
AGh.name: repeating_structure_name

AGl.caption: Use table custom margins?
AGl.doc: If yes, below you will be able to set margins for your table element. Leave this field as "no" for a default display, will ignore any margin-related numbers below.
AGl.name: table_custom_margins

AGq.caption: Page break
AGq.doc: Choose if this element will try to enforce a new page before or after itself.
AGq.name: page_break

AGr.caption: Body text style
AGr.doc: The name of the text style that will be applied to the table's body text.
AGr.name: tableStyle

AGs.caption: Table layout
AGs.name: table_layout
AGs.options: Standard,No Borders,Header Line Only,Light Horizontal Lines,Strong Outer Border,Zebra,Light Horizontal Lines Without Header

AGx.caption: Into multi column
AGx.doc: "Yes" to insert this repeated table into a repeated multi column.
AGx.name: into_multi_column

AGy.caption: Multi column name
AGy.doc: The name of the multi column that this repeated table is being inserted into. Use this only with a multi column that is also being inserted into a repeating structure.
AGy.name: multi_column_name
